description: Information about the cell line used in the biomaterial
title: cell_line

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

catalog_number.description: The supplier catalogue number for the cell line.

catalog_url.description: The supplier catalogue URL for the cell line.

cell_cycle.description: The cell cycle phase if the cell line is synchronized growing cells or the phase is known. Should be a child term of https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/go/terms?iri=http%3A%2F%2Fpurl.obolibrary.org%2Fobo%2FGO_0007049.

cell_line_type.description: The type of cell line. Must be one of primary, immortalized, stem cell-derived, or synthetic.

cell_morphology.description: Features relating to the morphology of cells in a biomaterial.

growth_conditions.description: Features relating to the growth and/or maintenance of a biomaterial.

cell_type.description: The cell type that the cell line was derived from. Should be a child term of https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/clo/terms?iri=http%3A%2F%2Fpurl.obolibrary.org%2Fobo%2FCL_0000003.

date_established.description: When the cell line was established, in date-time format. yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ.

disease.description: Free text describing any disease association to the cell type. Should be an EFO ontology.

genus_species.description: The scientific binomial name for the species of the biomaterial.

publications.description: One or more publications in which the cell line creation was cited.
